products.title: Bari Spc, Perano - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the contemporary bari spc in perano within your home for a burst of soothing cornflower blue with a refreshing quality and modern style. The contrast of the blind's substantial texture and subtle shade creates a distinctive look that offers chic style and, due to its simple rolling mechanism, functional practicality. Breathe life and light into a modern, all-white kitchen by including the perano.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Solitaire - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual. By combining bespoke craft with a natural tone, every slat brings an air of relaxation that will instantly make you and your guests feel at home. Origin deluxe, solitaire - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, African Blackwood - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ultimate in luxury, the origin deluxe african blackwood offers all of the style and functionality of the standard range, yet with a cool, designer look, with its thick louvres and sleek, jet black finish. And, as well as a matching pelmet and rail, it comes with coordinated, high quality ladder tapes. There is no colour combination more glamorous than that of black and gold, so embrace the luxe and pair the two tones together in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Trippy, Nimbus - Roller Blind
products.description: The trippy nimbus is at the height of fashion right now, with its soft grey and funky chevron patterning, and offers a contemporary, up-to-date style that simply can't be matched. Use it for privacy without compromising on light, as this blind will filter it gently through. Use in a modern open living area, set against white walls and grey soft furnishings, with the occasional lime or orange accessory to add a pop of colour.

products.title: Innocence, Mint - Roller Blind
products.description: The gentle fern patterning on the innocence in mint is eye-catching without being overpowering, and the soft, mint green backdrop is a beautifully subtle haze of colour that looks particularly pretty as the light filters through it. We all want to wake up to a bright, fresh room to start their morning, and the mint is perfect for helping to achieve that in the master bedroom. Alternatively, combine with whites and soft greys for a gentle, hushed look in the kitchen or dining room.

products.title: Innocence, Wedgewood - Roller Blind
products.description: The innocence in wedgewood is a soft, sky blue fabric blind with off-white ferns scattered on top and a cool but homely feel. Light will gently filter through the fabric, giving a soft, mild glow to the room, and the simple rolling mechanism makes it durable and easy to use. Pair with off-white walls for a summery feel in the bedroom all year round, or use as a stand-alone window feature in a hallway or utility room.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Wengi - Venetian Blind
products.description: Transfix your guests with the distinguishing and dynamic kolsva deluxe in wengi, where bold sophistication meets classic, craftsman excellence. This dramatic, twilight shaded blind with coordinating supports and decorative trimmings, generates a demanding window arrangement with modern components and valuable utility. Fashion a creative master bedroom with striking characteristics and vivid colour by suspending the wengi against a vibrant teal background.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Sheesham - Venetian Blind
products.description: For a homely and convivial dcor scheme containing authentic, basswood timber and extra designer detail, elect the kolsva deluxe sheesham for its wholesome, conker shade. Sourced from sustainable forests, these craftsman-built, quality louvres, with matching supports and decorative ladders, produce a glamorous window dressing that is both conservational and convenient. Generate a luxury living space by corresponding the sheesham with similarly toned, deep furnishings, and walnut-hued flooring.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki, Marina - Roller Blind
products.description: Enoki marina combines a deep and inspirational blue with a vibrant pattern that's hard to define. The way it ebbs and flows across the fabric is perfect for when you want to express yourself, and yet it still retains that elegant touch of luxury modern decor is known for. If you like the way in which the blue shimmers in the light, why not add a similar crisp green to the mix to provide an elegant colour contrast? The two shades will then come together to create a light and positive space that you'll love to spend time in.

products.title: Ferns, Inkwell - Roller Blind
products.description: A deep and moody blue is the inspiration behind this light and breezy fabric. The subtle shimmer and intricate stitching give the ferns a life of their own that makes you feel like a calming breeze is circulating in the room. Perfect for resting and relaxing as you put your feet up. Take a look at dark grassy greens if you want to create a natural colour combination that will live long in the memory.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you want to rest and relax you need a blind that sits gently in the background and doesn't fight for your attention. The gentle colour of cotswold monroe bisque is perfect if you want to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere that flows naturally from your window space. Pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug in front of the fire and some contemporary canvas wall art is the perfect way to make your house a home.

products.title: Crosshatch, Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: Crosshatch silver combines a classic geometric pattern with a striking silver that is sure to make a little noise. It's a pattern that seems to reverse depending on the angle of the light, and one which is finished with aplomb by the slightly blueish quality of the silver threads. Combining silver with a dark charcoal is a great way to emphasise the elegance of the shimmer. It's all about giving the threads the platform they need to speak for themselves, so don't be shy about organising your room with this purpose in mind.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Sycamore - Venetian Blind
products.description: Uniting practicality with elegance, the kolsva deluxe sycamore hosts modern, adjustable louvres with quality, and coordinating, decorative ladders. This authentic window dressing displays a natural, sun-kissed timber with comparable supports for traditional and tasteful style. Fashion a sophisticated and restful dcor in the boudoir, by embracing the sycamore with similarly toned furnishings and lushly textured wallpaper.

products.title: Ferns, Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns in sand is the dreamy and relaxing fabric you have been searching for, and it's now available as a classic roller blind. The causal way in which the ferns twist and turn on the fabric, catching the light in different ways as they go is testament to the refined subtlety of the design. Transforming the guest bedroom used to be the job that would never end, but those days are now a thing of the past.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki, Oyster - Roller Blind
products.description: Zaragoza enoki oyster takes the traditional silver fabrics you will have seen for years and brings them right up to date in one fell swoop. The way in which it dances with the light serves to accentuate the vitality and energy of the patterning, and adds depth to your decor like never before. Inspiration can be found in the strangest of places, but that doesn't mean you should avoid the obvious sources.

products.title: Ferns, Forest - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns forest captures your imagination the moment you see it thanks to the tranquil green that works in harmony with the gentle shimmer of the threads. Each fern has a lifelike quality of its own that makes you feel as if a gentle breeze is moving subtly in the background. A deep aqua blue or a sandy brown would be perfect bedfellows for the forest green your new roller blinds bring to the table.

products.title: Karma, Taupe - Roller Blind
products.description: If you are looking for a dark and moody colour that still adds some light and sparkle to your home, karma taupe could be just what you need. The background glistens and shimmers, making any space feel alive and energetic. And at the same time the matt finish of the trees give it a slightly sombre and tempered feel. A truly thought-provoking contrast. Take your time with taupe, and look to add matching patterns to your wallpaper and scatter cushions.

products.title: Ferns, Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: As you stand back and contemplate whether to introduce ferns snow into your home take a minute to think about what you're seeing. The lightweight fabric works perfectly with the crisp white to make you feel at ease the moment you walk in the door. Plus you have the natural inspiration of the plant pattern underneath. It's simple decor at its finest. Take your room in an exciting creative direction by doing away with everything other than natural finishes and looks.

products.title: Ferns, Gold - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns in sand is the dreamy and relaxing fabric you have been searching for, and it's now available as a classic roller blind. The causal way in which the ferns twist and turn on the fabric, catching the light in different ways as they go is testament to the refined subtlety of the design. Transforming the guest bedroom used to be the job that would never end, but those days are now a thing of the past.

products.title: Kalmar, Ridgeback - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar ridgeback is a subtly layered design that weaves woody browns and light stone greys together in perfect harmony. By finishing things off with light grey dashes that amplify the natural backdrop of the wooden grain it allows you to see something different every time you look at it. Turn the living room into the relaxing and homely space that you've always wanted by building your new colour scheme out from your windows.

products.title: Kalmar, Spanish Cedar - Venetian Blind
products.description: A lighter finish always adds a more contemporary feel to a wood, and the kalmar in spanish cedar brings a classic edge through textured grain and a gentle polish. With high quality parts, and durable basswood, this blind also offers practicality by the bucketload. Finish off a clean and contemporary kitchen, with just a hint of country style, by incorporating the spanish cedar. White units will pair beautifully with wooden worktops, in a similar finish to that of the blind, and a refreshing duck egg blue will offset the look nicely.

products.title: Kalmar, Slate - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you add kalmar slate to your home you get to sit back and enjoy a subtle design that offers you different looks and shades as the light level in your space changes. With a broad spectrum of on-trend greys each vying for your attention you'll have nothing else to do but sit back and enjoy the visual. Combining slate with a couple of complimentary dark accessories in an otherwise light and breezy room is the way to get the most out of it.

products.title: Kalmar, Jacobean Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark wood makes for a classic feature in any room and the kalmar's jacobean oak is a real statement piece. The sturdy, quality basswood, which we source from only sustainable forests, is stained in a traditional dark oak, resulting in a window dressing that offers both style and class. The jacobean oak speaks for itself, so keep its surrounding decor clean and simple, painting the walls in a homely cream and choosing sofas to match.

products.title: Kalmar, Pearl River - Venetian Blind
products.description: Painted in light grey, and with a pretty shabby chic effect, the kalmar in pearl river will make a fashionable addition to any home. The quality basswood is responsibly sourced from sustainable forests, so you can be sure you're doing the right thing for the planet - as well as gaining a gorgeous blind for your home. Use the pearl river to craft a vintage theme in your study, opting for a dusky pink feature wall and painting the remaining walls in soft cream or barely-there grey-white.

products.title: Innocence, Nimbus - Roller Blind
products.description: Light and translucent, the innocence numbus is a gentle grey light-filtering blind that will mute the sun's rays without blocking them out completely. The lightweight fabric is high quality and hardwearing, so this blind will keep serving its purpose year after year. Perfectly matched to the on-trend shabby chic look, the numbus will match white wicker and worn furniture in a beautifully vintage-styled bedroom.

products.title: Innocence, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: A soft, neutral blind, patterned with simply drawn, off-white ferns, the innocence in natural is quiet and unassuming. The gently light-filtering material allows just the right amount of light through, whilst still offering all of the privacy you need. Cream-coloured kitchens with a light and airy feel will benefit from the natural, which will hang discreetly amongst both stronger colours and other neutrals, making it the ideal shade for those who prefer hushed, low-key hues without any risk of colour-clashing.

products.title: Tropicana, Multi - Roller Blind
products.description: For those of you who want your decor to really make a statement we give you tropicana multi. This heady mix of pastels and navy blue allows you to lose yourself in the moment like never before. Perfect if you want to feel like you're in a world all of your own. The playful natural of tropicana multi makes it an inspired choice when you want to revamp the family kitchen. With a whole new portfolio of colours and lines you'll be able to see things differently as you cook up a feast.

products.title: Ferns, Tungsten - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns tungsten takes your senses on a journey they will never forget. Whether it's the timeless stone grey, the light and breezy feel of the fabric itself, or the gentle shimmer of the stitching, you'll find something to fall in love with the moment you hang your new blinds. Adding in woody browns and sandy beiges is a great way to create a natural symphony of colour that you'll take pride in looking at every time you come home.

products.title: Prism, Entice - Roller Blind
products.description: Cool and calm, the prism entice will indeed entice your eyes, drawing them in to this lovely window feature. Muted dark blues take centre stage, quietly complemented by off-whites and dusky light blues, and the creamy white background allows plenty of light through to show the colours off. Design a calming atmosphere in the guest bedroom by placing the entice amongst cream-white walls and accenting ornaments.

products.title: Crosshatch, Sea Urchin - Roller Blind
products.description: Imagine a world without sea urchin from the crosshatch collection. It would be devoid of colour and retro patterning - two things you never want to be without. The dreamy blue is perfect for setting your mind at ease at the end of a long day. Matching to sea urchin is all about looking for suitable reds and greens that bring simple geometric touches of style with them. Once you find them you can add that secondary layer to your decor that all great interiors have.

products.title: Crosshatch, Inkspot - Roller Blind
products.description: Inkspot is perhaps their favourite fabrics from the crosshatch range because of the way the deep moody blue allows you to lose yourself in the moment. It's a shade whose impact can be felt around the room no matter the layout of your home. When you want to celebrate the unique features of your home you need these slightly quirky touches. The blue has a regal quality that you've seen for years, but it's the slightly throwback pattern that sits underneath it that really makes a house a home.

products.title: Prism, Nutmeg - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want a fabric that combines inspirational design with a calming set of homely colours you need something just like prism nutmeg. The relaxed array of creams and beiges work in perfect harmony with the folksy and homely look of the trees. Just what you need when you're trying to make your house feel like home. Matching to nutmeg is all about embracing the browns and working in other similar shades to your room.

products.title: Crosshatch, Sandstorm - Roller Blind
products.description: Sandstorm provides a touch of natural colour combined in perfect harmony with a luxurious pattern that ticks all the right boxes. This is a fabric that means something different to different people. You might feel it's luxurious, authentic, glamorous, elegant, or a whole host of other things. What matters is you find a place for it in your home. We love the idea of using the gentle sandy colour to add a sleepy and wholesome quality to the bedroom.

products.title: Prism, Sage - Roller Blind
products.description: There aren't many colours more refreshing than a soft apple green, and that's what you get with the prism in sage, combined with pale mints and a rich cream background. Lightweight, beautifully woven fabric creates the basis for this blind, and hangs simply and elegantly when rolled down. Wake up to a calm, cheery bedroom by using the pretty green in the sage to form the foundation of your colour scheme, pairing it with creams walls, forest green accents, and medium woods.

products.title: Tropicana, Forest - Roller Blind
products.description: Tropicana forest is one of their most in-demand fabrics right now, and it's not hard to see why. The beauty of the jungle is brought to life with a portfolio of life-affirming greens that breathe life, energy, and vitality into any room in the house. As you survey the colours on offer you can quickly lose yourself in the intricacy of the visual. This is not your typical print. It's a reinterpretation of a classic look that allows you to weave in a dozen new shades and tones.

products.title: Prism, Thunder - Roller Blind
products.description: Prism thunder combines a cheery and welcoming style of printing with a slightly colder and more distant colour scheme. The end result is a design that welcomes you through the door before slowing things down and taking the edge off. The light blues make this the perfect addition to the master bedroom so that you can switch off and begin to wind down. It's all about adding in other slightly faded colours like greens and browns.

products.title: Dragonfly, Tropical Sunset - Roller Blind
products.description: Tropical sunset is a blend of colours that allows you to lose yourself in the moment and celebrate the free artistic expression that brings the design to life. The calming blues and passionate pinks evoke memories of time spent outside in the sun -just what you need to brighten any day. If you want to add a statement piece to the dining room there's no better way to do it than choosing your favourite colour from tropical sunset.

products.title: Dragonfly, Lagoon - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new dragonfly lagoon fabric is guaranteed to catch the eye the moment you unroll it. If you love to celebrate the beauty of nature through an artistic lens then be prepared for an explosion of colour and texture. The way in which the greens and blues effortlessly ebb and flow into one another allows you to lose yourself in the moment like never before. Wall art is the order of the day if you want to extend the influence of lagoon around the room.

products.title: Blossom, Ice Breeze - Roller Blind
products.description: Blossom ice breeze has an icy blue background combined in perfect harmony with a lively array of greens and purples. They serve to elevate it from a fabric that calms a room, to one that brings it to life. The florals take on a life on their own the moment you take them in. As you search for ways to integrate ice breeze into your home don't forget the beauty of the natural world. If you can find new ways to view it through various artistic lenses then that's everything you need to fall in love with your home all over again.

products.title: Blossom, Blue Oar - Roller Blind
products.description: We fell in love with blue oar the moment we saw it because of the nocturnal resonance of the blue. It reminds us of seeing natural colours set against the dark evening sky - a time when the greens and pinks actually become magnified as their colourful backdrop fades to black. If you want to bottle this feeling, adding blue oar to your bathroom would be an inspired choice. It can be hard to find space for pictures and artwork in one of the more specialist spaces in the home, which means floral blinds offer a unique opportunity.

products.title: Crosshatch, Lime Zest - Roller Blind
products.description: The thing you'll notice about lime zest from their crosshatch collection is that it combines a modern energetic green with a timeless pattern that has a hint of retro style. It's a match made in decor heaven when you get down to it, and it's one that we're delighted to showcase. If you want to take your decor in a slightly retro direction then the vibe of lime zest is just what the doctor ordered.

products.title: Dragonfly, Sunset - Roller Blind
products.description: When the sun goes down there are dozen shades of orange and red that light up the sky. Dragonfly sunset allows you to embrace this symphony of colour whilst simultaneously using it to construct a visual that unifies your decor. A true touch of artistic inspiration that allows any home to look its best. As you sit and think about what to match to sunset can we suggest one thing? The electricity of the pinks allows you to work in darker shades of purple and black into your room without removing too much light and energy.

products.title: Trippy, Sunbeam - Roller Blind
products.description: Trippy sunbeam is the heady mix of striking patterning and vibrant colour that you've been looking for, and it's now available as an iconic roller blind. The lightweight fabric drifts gently in the breeze, whilst the energy of the yellow radiates around the room and fills you with energy. If you like the idea of creating the perfect high energy kitchen you need to start looking for other bright pastel colour accessories and finishing touches.

products.title: Blossom, Spring Burst - Roller Blind
products.description: Spring burst is aptly named because of the way in which the colour explodes off the fabric and catches your eye from every angle. It's a wise choice when you want to inject some energy into small compact spaces, and because of the nature of the florals it won't overpower your space either. Matching to spring burst is all about taking the pale blue as the unifying base colour and then adorning your surfaces with other artistic impressions.

products.title: Crosshatch, Clean White - Roller Blind
products.description: Neutral decor doesn't have to be plain and simple if you don't want it to be, so why settle for less? That was the thinking behind their crosshatch collection, and it's what brings clean white to life. The intricate stitching that creates the geometric pattern is truly a joy to behold. As you stand back and admire the gentle presence of clean white you can start thinking about matching options. A light cream and a darker charcoal grey are great options to explore a little further.

products.title: Blossom, Precious Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of blossom precious pink is the way in which it combines energetic greens and soothing purples to create a picture that connects with your decor. It's more than an addition, it's a starting point. This means you have the freedom to rework your colour scheme safe in the knowledge that you'll love the end result. Take the opportunity to introduce light blues and faded pinks if that's what you feel like doing.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Abyss - Roller Blind
products.description: Graphite is one of the must-have colours of the year which is why we've used it as the foundation for their new abyss blackout fabric. That means as well as sleeping right through the night, you can also turn on the style with subtle flecks of colour that cause the overall shade to ebb and flow. Could there be a better way to breathe new life into the master bedroom than by matching abyss with a light green bedspread? Well, perhaps you could treat yourself to some sandy beige scatter cushions and a matching rug at the same time.

products.title: Anthology, Abyss - Vertical Blind
products.description: The light, natural brown of the anthology in abyss makes for a blind that is truly fit for purpose, with a supple, woven fabric that will pull its weight amongst all kinds of colour schemes and dcor styles. This pretty country fabric blend perfectly in a rustic setting, such as a living room filled with hessians, natural woods, and shabby chic furniture. Alternatively, use in the bathroom amidst bright turquoises or lively greens to create a gorgeous colour scheme that you won't want to walk out of.

products.title: Anthology, Cobra - Vertical Blind
products.description: The anthology in cobra combines a rich brown colour with a lightweight woven fabric, cut into streamlined louvres that hang neatly from the rail and can be easily tilted or moved to change the light content of the room as you please. The natural look and feel of the cobra makes it ideal to hang above a workstation in a tranquil office, where light and air is an absolute must. Otherwise, try it in the kitchen to create a traditionally country feel, set against forest greens and rich terracottas.

products.title: Kalmar, Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar barkley brings a modern theme into your home by combining dark stone greys and subtle off-whites to create a rich tapestry of shape and form. With each slat hanging gently in the breeze you'll be able to rest and relax all year round. Transforming the dining room is what barkley does as well as any of their designs. By combining it with a matching set of tableware and a centrepiece you'll be able to dress the room to impress the next time you have your friends and family over to taste your culinary exploits.
